decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposed eaves of the proposed side and rear extensions would exceed the eaves height of the existing dwellinghouse and as such the proposal would fail to comply with the limitations set out under  A.1(d) of Class A, Part 1 of Schedule 2 of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 2 - The edge of the enlargement (rear dormer) closest to the eaves of the original roof shall, is  less than 0.2 metres from the eaves, measured along the roof slope from the outside edge of the eaves. It would therefore not be within the tolerances of Condition B2 (b) (bb), Class B, Part 1 of Schedule 2 of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 2 - The edge of the enlargement (rear dormer) closest to the eaves of the original roof shall, is  less than 0.2 metres from the eaves, measured along the roof slope from the outside edge of the eaves.
